resources.string: Connection
Files
Job
Bed historic
Printer profiles
Printer state
Tools historic
Settings
Slicing
System commands
Timelapses
Versions
The Printoid Debug Bridge is a tool used by the developer of the application when you run into issue regarding the OctoPrint features. Please use it when requested by the developer ;)
GET /api/connection returns the description of the current printer connection status.
GET /api/files returns the description of all the stored files, including folders.
GET /api/job returns the description of the current printing job.
GET /api/printer/bed returns the description of the bed temperatures historic.
GET /api/printerprofiles returns the description of the configured printer profiles.
GET /api/printer returns the description of the printer status, including temperatures.
GET /api/printer/tool returns the description of the tools temperatures historic.
GET /api/settings returns the description of the server settings and configured plugins.
GET /api/slicing returns the description of the available slicers and profiles.
GET /api/system/commands returns the description of the available OctoPrint system commands.
GET /api/timelapse returns the description of the available timelapses.
GET /api/version returns the description of the OctoPrint server version.
